title: Ion etching modulates the synthesis of CoNiCU sulfide for high-performance supercapacitors
content:
Sustainable Energy Fuels, 2024, Advance Article
DOI: 10.1039/D3SE01425H, Paper
Hao Wu, Jie Zhu, Guoxiang Wang, Qingwang Min, Boyan Ai, Pengchao Liang, Rui Yuan, Dahui Fang
The trimetallic sulfide with an octahedral hollow structure is a supercapacitor component material with excellent performance.
